page.title: 09R E L I G I O N
page.content: The parish church of St. Mary is the only place of worship for the village of Stanford.There was once a Chapel of Ease in Orleton. For members of denominations other than Church of England, there are Roman Catholic churches in Tenbury and Stourport,and nonconformist chapels in Tenbury all about 10 miles away.{St.Mary's church is in the united parish of the North Teme,consisting of Lindridge,Knighton Stockton,Stanford and Pensax. Each community has its own church. Services are held on alternate Sundays. The number of Stanford residents on the Municipal Election list is 104 and there are 31 members on the Church Electoral Roll. Most villagers support the church whether they attend local services or not. Social events organised to help maintain the buildings are always well attended.
